Title: Instagram Reels For Interior Designers & Home Stylists ï½œ Don't Make The Same Mistake I Did!

Content.Knowledge Point: What are Instagram Reels and why should interior designers create them?
Content.Text: Instagram Reels are short-form, vertical videos that can be up to 60 seconds long. They are shown to new audiences and can help attract potential clients to your profile.

You can create Reels from your Reels tab, Instagram home screen, or Instagram Stories camera. Add music, sound effects, stickers, or text, and edit your videos using various apps like InShot, CapCut, or Canva.

Content.Knowledge Point: Examples of Instagram Reels for interior designers
Content.Text: Examples include making a flat lay or mood board, working on a design concept, taking a tour of your home or studio, creating before and after transformations, and answering frequently asked questions.

Content.Knowledge Point: Benefits of Instagram Reels for interior designers
Content.Text: Reels can attract new people to your profile, help establish contact with potential clients, and extend the reach of your content on other platforms.
